name: Scrapybara
headline: Virtual Desktops for AI Agents
description: Scrapybara hosts remote desktop instances for computer use agents like CUA and Claude Computer Use. With our unified API, developers can write one line of code to execute agents with any model and access low-level controls like the browser, filesystem, and code sandboxes. We handle autoscaling, auth, and system environments so anyone can deploy fleets of agents to production and automate any free-form computing task at scale.

founders.name: Nalin Semwal, Founder
founders.description: co-founder @ scrapybara. ‚Çç·ê¢‚Ä¢(‹´)‚Ä¢·ê¢‚Çé I did LLM Agent Research at Georgia Tech and then at MultiOn. I'm now building Scrapybara (F24)

## DEAD EASY COMPUTER USE
One unified interface for computer use agents. Any model, any tool.
[Explore docs](https://scrapybara.com/<https:/docs.scrapybara.com/act-sdk>)
## PYTHON
ACT SDK
## PYTHON
LEGACY
## TYPESCRIPT
ACT SDK
SUPPORTED LANGUAGES
```
1from scrapybara import Scrapybara
2from scrapybara.anthropic import Anthropic
3from scrapybara.tools import ComputerTool, BashTool, EditTool
4
5client = Scrapybara()6instance = client.start_ubuntu()7
8response = client.act(9  tools=[10   ComputerTool(instance),11   BashTool(instance),12   EditTool(instance)13],14  model=Anthropic(),15  system="You are a webscraping agent",16  prompt="Scrape all YC W25 companies",17)18messages = response.messages
```

FEATURES
## EVERYTHING YOUR AGENT NEEDS
Connect your agent to Browser, Code, File, and more low-level protocols.
[Explore tools](https://scrapybara.com/<https:/docs.scrapybara.com/browser>)
### LIGHTNING FAST
Deploy full desktops under 1s
### AUTHENTICATED ACCESS
Save and load authenticated websites
### SESSION PERSISTENCE
Pause and resume instances
INSTANCE CAPABILITIES
### UBUNTU
Feature-rich Linux desktop
### BROWSER
Lightweight Chromium browser
### WINDOWS
Full Windows desktop

PLANS
### AGENT CREDIT
Each step (1 assistant message with tool calls) consumes 1 agent credit when using the Act SDK or playground. New accounts get 100 agent credits. Additional credits are available at $0.05 each, or you can use your own API key.

generated_description:
### Scrapybara: Virtual Desktops for AI Agents

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch F24, Scrapybara is a compact yet powerful startup dedicated to transforming the way AI agents operate by providing virtual desktops. With a team of just two, they‚Äôre nimble and focused, led by their group partner, David Lieb.

#### The Mission
Scrapybara aims to host remote desktop instances tailored for AI agents such as CUA and Claude Computer Use. The goal? Simplifying the deployment and scaling of these agents, allowing developers to execute complex tasks efficiently and effectively. Using a single unified API, developers can manage low-level controls‚Äîlike the browser, filesystem, and code sandboxes‚Äîwith minimal hassle.

#### What They Offer
Scrapybara‚Äôs service allows developers to **painlessly deploy computer use agents** alongside reliable desktop infrastructure. Here are some standout features:

- **Unified Interface**: One interface for computer use agents, supporting any model and tool.
- **Speed**: Deploy full desktops in under one second.
- **Session Persistence**: Ability to pause and resume instances for flexibility.
- **Diverse Instance Types**: Options for Ubuntu, Windows, and lightweight web browsing with Chromium.
- **Flexible Pricing**: Free accounts start with 10 compute hours and 50 authentication states, with paid plans ranging from $29 to $99 per month based on usage.

#### Use Cases
Scrapybara provides several demonstrated applications:
- **Teleo**: A computer use AI agent for general tasks.
- **Copycat**: An agent specifically designed to replicate websites from scratch.
- **W25**: A tool for scraping, researching, and drafting content.

Each of these tools comes with easy access to demo code, enabling developers to get started quickly.

#### Getting Started
Interested individuals can start using Scrapybara‚Äôs offerings for free, explore their documentation, or join their community on Discord. The company‚Äôs website (https://scrapybara.com) is filled with resources to help new and experienced users alike.

In conclusion, Scrapybara is on a mission to make AI agent deployment straightforward and scalable. With the backing of Y Combinator and a clear focus on innovation, they are poised to make a significant impact in the tech landscape.
